Description: Ostracon, fragment of the shoulder section of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is relatively coarse and grey-black in section, the exterior is covered with light-brown slip and very faint traces of four lines of black-painted demotic text, with a band of red-slip above.
Curator's comments: Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393505) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393505)
